overview:
Prior to joining FormVerse, Inc., Mr. Deininger served in executive positions with several established and start-up companies such as Tapestry Medical (acquired by Alere Medical), E*TRADE, Thomson Corporation, and Autonomy ZANTAZ (acquired by HP) where his responsibilities included sales, marketing and channel development. While at these firms, Mr. Deininger drove expansion into new markets, negotiated distribution agreements with partners such as IBM and EMC, and managed sales teams to drive exponential sales growth.

Mr. Deininger’s experience includes negotiating an $18 million contract with the U.S. Department of the Interior, managing a sales team to increased sales 412% over three years while at E*TRADE, and negotiation/implementation of multiple joint venture agreements. Mr. Deininger’s contributions in business development have enabled the sale of multiple companies.
